analyzed: asaṅga triśatikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kārikā saptatiḥ
paramaḥ nugrahaḥ jñeyaḥ śārīraḥ sa parigrahaḥ

original: prāptāprāptāvihānau ca paramā syāt parīndanā // TśPk_1
analyzed: prāpta aprāptau ihānau ca paramā syāt parīndanā
vipulaḥ tyantaḥ viparyastaḥ ca cetasi
upakāra āśayaḥ sthānam yāne smin guṇa pūritaḥ tśp k
dānam pāramitā āṣatkam āmiṣa abhaya dharmataḥ
eka dvaya trayeṇa iha pratipad sā pratiṣṭhitā
ātma bhāve pratikṛtau vipāke ca api asakta tā
apravṛtti tad anya artha pravṛtti parivarjane tu śp k
pragrahaḥ maṇḍale tredhā nimittāt citta vāraṇam
uttara uttara saṃdeha janmataḥ ca nivāraṇā
saṃskṛta tvena saṃkalpya saṃpad prāptau nivāryate
trailakṣaṇya anyathābhāvāt tad abhāvāt tathāgataḥ
sa hetu phala gāmbhīrya deśanā asmin yuga adhame

original: na niṣphalā yataḥ santi bodhisattvās trayānvitāḥ // TśPk_7
analyzed: na niṣphalāḥ yatas santi bodhisattvāḥ traya anvitāḥ
śikṣayā upāsānāt pūrvam kuśalasya avaropaṇāt
śīlavantaḥ nyabuddheṣu guṇavantaḥ ca kīrtitāḥ
sa pudgaleṣu dharmeṣu saṃjñāyāḥ viprahāṇataḥ
prajñāvantaḥ ca saṃjñāyāḥ aṣṭadhā aṣṭa artha bhedataḥ
pṛthagbhāvena saṃtatyāḥ vṛtteḥ ājīvita sthiteḥ

original: punaś ca gatilīnatvād ātmasaṃjñā caturvidhā // TśPk_10
analyzed: punar ca gati līna tvāt ātma saṃjñā caturvidhā
sarva abhāvāt abhāvasya sadbhāvāt na abhilāpyataḥ
abhilāpa prayogāt ca dharma saṃjñā caturvidhā
adhimukti vaśāt teṣām bhūta saṃjñā prasādataḥ
yathā ruta āgrahāt saṃyak deśita tvasya ca udgrahāt
phalataḥ na mitāḥ buddhaiḥ praṇidhi jñāna lakṣitāḥ
tad vāda vinivṛttaye

original: asthānād ānukūlyāc ca dharmeṣv adhigamasya hi /
analyzed: asthānāt ānukūlyāt ca dharmeṣu adhigamasya hi

original: kolasyeva parityāgo dharme saṃdhis tato mataḥ // TśPk_14
analyzed: kolasya iva parityāgaḥ dharme saṃdhiḥ tatas mataḥ

original: nairmāṇikena no buddho dharmo nāpi ca deśitaḥ /
analyzed: nairmāṇikena naḥ buddhaḥ dharmaḥ na api ca deśitaḥ
deśitaḥ tu dvaya agrāhyaḥ vācyaḥ vākpatha lakṣaṇāt
grahaṇa deśaṇā ca asya na apārthā puṇya saṃgrahāt

original: puṇyaṃ bodhyanupastaṃbhād upastaṃbhād dvayasya ca // TśPk_16
analyzed: puṇyam bodhi an upastaṃbhāt upastaṃbhāt dvayasya ca
svābhāvika āpti hetu tvāt tad anyasya ca janmanaḥ
kaivalyāt buddha dharmāṇām agrya tvam puṇya sādhanam
a grāhya an abhilapya tvam sva phalānām an udgrahāt
dvaya āvaraṇa nirmokṣāt subhūtau araṇā dvayam
buddha dīpaṃkara a grāhāt vakyena adhigamasya hi
tatas ca adhigame siddhā agrāhya anabhilāpya tā
jñāna nisyanda vijñapti mātra tvāt kṣetra nā udgrahaḥ

original: avigrahatvād agratvād avyūhaṃ vyūhatā matā // TśPk_20
analyzed: a vigraha tvāt agra tvāt a vyūham vyūha tā matā

original: sumeror iva rājatve saṃbhoge nāsti codgrahaḥ /
analyzed: sumeroḥ iva rāja tve saṃbhoge nā asti ca udgrahaḥ

original: sāsravatvena cābhāvāt saṃskṛtatvena cāsya hi // TśPk_21
analyzed: sa āsrava tvena ca abhāvāt saṃskṛta tvena ca asya hi
bahu tva bheda khyāti artham viśeṣasya ca siddhaye
paurvāparyeṇa puṇyasya punar dṛṣṭānta deśanā
dvayasya pātrīkaraṇāt nisyanda tva mahatvataḥ
asaṃkleśasya hetu tvāt dhīna abhibhavanāt api
tad phala śreṣṭha duḥkha tvāt durlabha artha uttama arthataḥ
jñeya apāramita tvāt ca parā sādhāraṇa tvataḥ
gāḍha gaṃbhīra bhāvāt ca para sūtra viśiṣṭataḥ

original: mahāśuddhānvayatvāc ca puṇyāt puṇyaṃ viśiṣyate // TśPk_25
analyzed: mahāśuddha anvaya tvāt ca puṇyāt puṇyam viśiṣyate

original: sahiṣṇutā ca caryāyāṃ duṣkarāyāṃ śubhā yataḥ /
analyzed: sahiṣṇu tā ca caryāyām duṣkarāyām śubhā yatas
tad guṇa aparimāṇa tvāt agra arthena nirucyate
ātma vyāpāda saṃjñāyāḥ abhāvāt duḥkha tā na ca
sa sukhā karuṇā bhāvāt caryā duḥkha phalā tatas
citta a tyāga abhinirhāre yatnaḥ kāryaḥ dṛḍhaḥ yatas
kṣānti pāramitā prāptau tad prāyogikaḥ eva ca
pratipattiḥ ca sattva arthāḥ vijñeyā hetu bhāvataḥ
sattva vastu nimittāt tu vijñeyā parivarjitā
nāma skandhāḥ ca tad vastu tad saṃjñā apagamāt jine
tad abhāvaḥ hi buddhānām tattva darśana yogataḥ
phala apratiṣṭhitaḥ mārgaḥ tad phalasya api kāraṇam

original: buddhānāṃ bhūtavāditvāt tac ca jñeyaṃ caturvidham // TśPk_31
analyzed: buddhānām bhūta vādi tvāt tat ca jñeyam caturvidham
pratijñā hīnayānasya mahāyānasya deśanā

original: sarvavyākaraṇānāṃ ca na visaṃvādinī yataḥ // TśPk_32
analyzed: sarva vyākaraṇānām ca na visaṃvādinī yatas

original: aprāpter ānukulyāc ca na satyā na mṛṣā matā /
analyzed: aprāpteḥ ānukulyāt ca na satyā na mṛṣā matā
yathā ruta niveśasya pratipakṣeṇa deśanā

original: x x x x x x x x x x x x x .alābhatā /
analyzed: x x x x x x x x x x x alābha tā

original: ajñānāt sapratiṣṭhena jñānād anyena lābhatā // TśPk_34
analyzed: ajñānāt sa pratiṣṭhena jñānāt anyena
tamaḥ prakāśam ajñānam jñānam āloka vat matam
pratipakṣa vipakṣasya lābha hānyā āmukha tvataḥ

original: yādṛśyā pratipattyā x x x x x x x x x /
analyzed: yādṛśyā

original: yat karmikā ca sā dharme pratipattis tad ucyate // TśPk_36
analyzed: yat karmikā ca sā dharme pratipattiḥ tat ucyate
vyañjane trividhāḥ dharma dhara tve śruta vistare
arthasya paratas āptau śravaṇa cintanāt

original: x x x x x x x x x x x x paripācane /
analyzed: paripācane
vastu kāla mahat tvena puṇyāt puṇyam viśiṣyate
agocara tvam kaivalyam mahātma āśrita tā tathā
durlabha śravatā ca eva dhātu puṣṭiḥ anuttarā

original: x x x x x x x x x x x pātratāśraye /
analyzed: x x x x x x x x pātratā āśraye

original: śodhanāvaraṇānāṃ ca kṣiprābhijñātvam eva ca // TśPk_40
analyzed: śodhana āvaraṇānām ca kṣipra abhijñā tvam eva ca
su mahān api

original: karmāṇi etāni dharme pratipatter matāni x // TśPk_41
analyzed: karmāṇi etāni dharme pratipatteḥ matāni

original: x x x x x x x x x bodhisattvakalpanā /
analyzed: bodhisattva kalpanā

original: cittāvaraṇam ākhyātaṃ yac cittam apratiṣṭhitaṃ // TśPk_42
analyzed: citta āvaraṇam ākhyātam yat cittam a pratiṣṭhitam

original: paścādvyākaraṇān no ca caryā dīpaṃkare parā /
analyzed: paścāt vyākaraṇāt no ca caryā dīpaṃkare parā

original: bodhis tac caryayā tulyā na sa x x x x x x // TśPk_43
analyzed: bodhiḥ tat caryayā tulyā na

original: x x x x x x x x na mṛṣā paridīpitā /
analyzed: na mṛṣā paridīpitā
dharmāḥ tatas buddha dharmāḥ sarve bhāva sva lakṣaṇāḥ

original: dharmakāyena buddhas tu mataḥ saḥ puruṣopamaḥ /
analyzed: dharmakāyena buddhaḥ tu mataḥ saḥ puruṣa upamaḥ

original: nirāvaraṇato x x x x x x x x x x x // TśPk_45
analyzed: nirāvaraṇataḥ

original: guṇamahātmyataś cāpi mahākāyaḥ sa eva hi /
analyzed: guṇa mahātmyataḥ ca api mahā kāyaḥ saḥ eva hi
abhāva kāya bhāvāt ca a kāyaḥ sau nirucyate
dharmadhātau akuśalaḥ sattva nirvāpaṇe matiḥ

original: kṣetrāṇāṃ śodhane caiva x x x x x x x x // TśPk_47
analyzed: kṣetrāṇām śodhane ca eva

original: sattvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmān yaś ca nairātmakān /
analyzed: sattvānām bodhisattvānām dharmān yaḥ ca nairātmakān

original: buddhyādhimucyate 'nārya āryo dhīmān sa kaṭhyate // TśPk_48
analyzed: buddhyā adhimucyate nāryaḥ āryaḥ dhīmān sa kaṭhyate

original: nopalambhe 'pi dharmāṇāṃ cakṣur na hi na vidyate /
analyzed: na upalambhe dharmāṇām cakṣuḥ na hi na vidyate

original: buddhānāṃ pañcadhā tac ca vitathārthasya darśanāt // TśPk_49
analyzed: buddhānām pañcadhā tat ca vitatha arthasya darśanāt
nānā vithata vijñapteḥ sṃṛti upasthāna varjanāt
syāḥ vitathā atas nirucyate

original: jñānasyādhārato jñeyā puṇye vitathatā na ca /
analyzed: jñānasya ādhārataḥ jñeyā puṇye vitatha tā na ca

original: tataḥ puṇyanimittaṃ hi punar dṛṣṭāntakīrtanam // TśPk_51
analyzed: tatas puṇya nimittam hi punar dṛṣṭānta kīrtanam
na dharma kāya niṣpattiḥ anuvyañjanam ucyate

original: na ca lakṣaṇasaṃpattis tad akāyatvato matā // TśPk_52
analyzed: na ca lakṣaṇa saṃpattiḥ tat akāya tvataḥ matā
dharmakāya avinirbhāgāt na dvayam na tathāgataḥ

original: saṃpattir ucyate bhūyo dvayaṃ nāsty astitā tataḥ // TśPk_53
analyzed: saṃpattiḥ ucyate bhūyas dvayam na asti astitā tatas

original: x x x x x x x x x x x x x kalpitā /
analyzed: x x x x x x x x x x x x kalpitā
dharmakāya avinirbhāgāt deśanā api a sva lakṣaṇā

original: deśyadaiśikagāṃbhīryaśraddhā na ca na santi hi /
analyzed: deśya daiśika gāṃbhīrya śraddhāḥ na ca na santi hi

original: na sattvā nāpi cāsattvās te 'nāryārya x x x x // TśPk_55
analyzed: na sattvāḥ na api ca asattvāḥ te

original: x x x x x x x x jñeyā bodhir anuttarā /
analyzed: x x x x x x jñeyā bodhiḥ anuttarā

original: na vṛddhyā dharmadhātau hi śuddhisāmyāt svalakṣaṇāt // TśPk_56
analyzed: na vṛddhyā dharmadhātau hi śuddhi sāmyāt sva lakṣaṇāt
upāya anuttara tvāt ca sa āsrava tvāt adharmataḥ

original: śubhā na dharmā x x x x x x x x x x x // TśPk_57
analyzed: śubhāḥ na
nā eva ca avyākṛta tve deśanā prāptaye matā

original: dharmaratnaṃ tataś caikaṃ ratnād anyād viśiṣyate // TśPk_58
analyzed: dharma ratnam tatas ca ekam ratnāt anyāt viśiṣyate
saṃkhyā prabhava jātīnām saṃbandhasya viśeṣaṇe

original: x x x x x x x x x x x x x labhyate // TśPk_59
analyzed: labhyate

original: samatvād dharmadhātoś ca na sattvā mocitā jinaiḥ /
analyzed: sama tvāt dharmadhātoḥ ca na sattvāḥ mocitāḥ jinaiḥ
saha nāmnā yatas skandhāḥ dharmadhātva bahis gatāḥ

original: ātmagrāhasamo dosas ta x x x x x x x /
analyzed: ātma grāha samaḥ dosaḥ

original: x x x x x grāhe hi agrāhagrāhatā matā // TśPk_61
analyzed: grāhe hi a grāha grāha tā matā
na ca eva rūpa kāyena saḥ numeyaḥ tathāgataḥ

original: dharmakāyo yataś cakravartī mābhūt tathāgataḥ // TśPk_62
analyzed: dharmakāyaḥ yatas cakravartī mā abhūt tathāgataḥ

original: na ca lakṣaṇavaipākyapuṇy. x x x x x x /
analyzed: na ca lakṣaṇa vaipākya puṇya x x x x x

original: dharmakāyasya lābho hi upāyo yad vilakṣaṇaḥ // TśPk_63
analyzed: dharmakāyasya lābhaḥ hi upāyaḥ yat vilakṣaṇaḥ
rūpa anuśrava mātreṇa na buddha jñaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ
tathatā dharma kāyaḥ hi yatas vijñāna gocaraḥ

original: na ca puṇyas x x x x x x x x x x x x /
analyzed: na ca puṇyaḥ x x x x x x x x x x
kṣānti lābhe na ucchedaḥ nirmalasya asya lābhataḥ
punar puṇya nimittam hi tasmāt dṛṣṭānta deśanā
tat puṇyasya a vipāka tvāt na udgrahaḥ sa parigrahaḥ

original: tan nirmāṇaphalaṃ teṣāṃ puṇya x x x x x x /
analyzed: tat nirmāṇa phalam teṣām

original: anābhogena yat karma buddhāḥ kurvanti dikṣu ca // TśPk_67
analyzed: anābhogena yat karma buddhāḥ kurvanti dikṣu ca

original: gatyādayas tu nirmāṇair buddhās tv avicalāḥ sadā /
analyzed: gati ādayaḥ tu nirmāṇaiḥ buddhāḥ tu avicalāḥ sadā

original: dharmadhātau ca tatsthānaṃ naikatvānyatvato matam // TśPk_68
analyzed: dharmadhātau ca tat sthānam na ekatva anyatvataḥ matam
rajaḥ maṣī kriyā dhātoḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ tasya dyotakaḥ
maṣīkaraṇa tā kleśa kṣayasya iha nidarśanam
a saṃcaya tva a piṇḍa tvam aneka tva nidarśanam

original: saṃhatasthānatā tasmin nānyatve ca nidarśanam // TśPk_70
analyzed: saṃhata sthāna tā tasmin na anya tve ca nidarśanam
vyavahāra mātra tāyāḥ bālānām udgrahaḥ nyathā

original: dvayābhāvān na bodhyāptiḥ prahāṇād ātmadharmayoḥ // TśPk_71
analyzed: dvaya abhāvāt na bodhi āptiḥ prahāṇāt ātma dharmayoḥ
tasmāt dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭiḥ ca nairarthya a bhūta kalpataḥ

original: sūkṣmam āvaraṇaṃ hy etat tathā jñānāt prahīyate // TśPk_72
analyzed: sūkṣmam āvaraṇam hi etat tathā jñānāt prahīyate
jñāna dvaya samādhāna praheyam tat ca deśitam

original: nirmāṇaiḥ kaśaṇāt puṇyaṃ tad buddhānāṃ na nākṣayam // TśPk_73
analyzed: nirmāṇaiḥ kaśaṇāt puṇyam tat buddhānām na na akṣayam
nirmitaḥ smi iti ca ātmānam kāśayantaḥ tathāgatāḥ

original: prakāśayanti nātmānaṃ tasmāt sā kāśanā satī // TśPk_74
analyzed: prakāśayanti na ātmānam tasmāt sā kāśanā satī

original: saṃskāro na tathā nānyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ hi tathāgate /
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ na tathā na anyam nirvāṇam hi tathāgate
navadhā saṃbhūtasya iha saṃyak jñāna parīkṣaṇāt
dṛṣṭiḥ nimittam vijñānam pratiṣṭhā deha bhoga tā

original: atītaṃ vartamānaṃ ca parīkṣyaṃ cāpy anāgatam // TśPk_76
analyzed: atītam vartamānam ca parīkṣyam ca api anāgatam
lakṣaṇasya upabhogasya pravṛtteḥ ca parīkṣaṇāt

original: nirmalāṃ teṣu vaśitāṃ saṃskāreṣu samāpnute // TśPk_77
analyzed: nirmalām teṣu vaśitām saṃskāreṣu samāpnute
triśatikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kārikā saptatiḥ samāptā
kṛtiḥ iyam ārya āsaṅga pādānām iti
